duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversight of the kitchen staff who prepare, cook, and garnish meals for hotel guests and patrons.
Provide leadership and guidance to the shift staff and also work on the hot or cold line as needed.
Inspect presentation quality and expedite the line as needed.
Read recipes and follow measurement instructions accurately.
Effectively communicate with all team members.
Practice safe and sanitary food handling techniques.
Maintain workstation and equipment safety and cleanliness.
Apply basic knife skills required for preparation of hot and cold foods.

education_certification.credential: Three years of training or related experience required.
Knowledge of food safety, sanitation, food products, and food service equipment.
Previous experience maintaining professional and respectful work relationships.
